attributes.title: are you gonna vote for this clown?
attributes.review:
-called people who were protesting against police brutality “thugs” but people who stormed a state capital with guns because they wanted haircuts “good people”
-use the phrase “when the looting starts, the shooting starts” which has a racist history
-in july 2015 he falsely claimed that immigrants bring diseases into america “tremendous infectious disease is pouring across the borders. the united states has has become a dumping ground for mexico and, in fact, many other places of the world”
-in june 2017 during a meeting talking about u.s. visas, trump said that people from haiti “all have aids” and that nigerian immigrants would never “go back to their huts” after experiencing the united states
-in january 2018 at a bipartisan meeting discussing protections for immigrants from haiti, el salvador, and african countries, trump asked, “why are we having all these people from sh*thole countries come here?” he then went on to suggest we should accept more immigrants from countries such as norway instead
-in may 2018 at a meeting with reporters at the white house he said “these aren’t people, they’re animals” when referring to undocumented immigrants
-in september 2015 trump falsely suggested that syrian refuges could be isis fighters in disguise
-in march 2016 trump claimed “i think islam hates us” in an interview with cnn
-the trump administration implemented a travel ban on people from five majority muslim countries after trump said “donald j. trump is calling for a total and complete shutdown of muslims entering the united states until our countries representatives can figure out what the h3ll is going on” at a rally in south carolina
-in 1973 trump got sued for refusing to rent to black people 
-in the 1980s trumps casinos were accused of hiding the black staff members when trump came to visit
-in 1989 trump took out a full page ad arguing for the death penalty for the central park five and was sued by the doj for discrimination 
-in 1991 trump said “black guys counting my money! i hate it. the only kinds of people i want counting my money are short guys who wear yarmulkes everyday. i think that [black] guy is lazy. and it’s probably not his fault, because laziness is a trait in blacks. it really is” 
-in 1992 trumps casino was fined $200k for transferring black dealers of certain tables to appease racist patrons 
-in 1993 trump said that native american casinos shouldnt be allowed because “they don’t look like indians to me”
-in 2000 trump ran a series of attack ads against native american casinos saying they had committed crimes (with no proof)
-in 2004 trump fired a black contestant from “the apprentice” for being over educated
-in 2010 trump argued in favor of segregating muslims in lower manhattan 
-in 2011 trump claimed that obama was born in kenya based on nothing but his skin color. he still hasn’t apologized or renounced that claim
 
or was all of that taken out of context too?

attributes.title: they ban tik tok, we ban them
✨🧚‍♀️NO HONEY NO🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.review:
⚠️AWWWWW HECK TO THE NOOO⚠️ DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS GOD FORSAKEN APP!!! i downloaded this app yesterday and as soon as I clicked it, I was 💥BOMBARDED💥with ✨CHEETO✨flavored fumes of the horrific orange himself!! The fumes 💨SWEPT💨me off my feet and sent me into the parallel universe where I began floating aimlessly into humongous big fat orange 🧚‍♀️CHEETOS🧚‍♀️ then my toaster was set on fire and my pet lizard lost his bff, the one and only, the famous ✨HAIRY TOAD✨(may he be in your prayers🙏) I WAS BESIDE MYSELF!!!! this evil Cheeto of a president has ruined my life!!!!!! AND MY POOR TOASTER IS NOW 🔥DECEASED🔥this is a warning to anyone who intends on getting this GOD AWFUL app. KEEP IN MIND I AM STILL ORBITING AROUND IN THIS 🎃CHEETO🎃FILLED UNIVERSE!! So unless you would like to stay on planet earth, then DONT get this app!! ⚠️I REPEAT DO NOT GET THIS APP⚠️ I tried calling for help from my phone, but the only “help” I received, was PRESIDENT RUMPS 💥cheeto💥 clan😤😤!!! (I received TOTAL 🤢bad vibes🤢from this) Then he and his little posy chased after me throughout this mysterious parallel universe with ✨STICKS COVERED IN FECES✨ so then I was forced to take out my wonderful handy dandy 🤩✨TRIDENT✨🤩 I fought off those stupid Cheetos until every single one was decapitated😌✌️I WILL NEVER EVER FORGIVE THAT ORANGE OF A “PRESIDENT”!!! all I can say about the app and mr. BUTTFACE is that they are the absolute ✨scum of the earth✨ thank you so much for your time😃 

Sincerely,
        Stewart Little🙈✨🙈 (may you have the most blessed day! ⚠️🧨🔪🪓EXCEPT FOR THE MR. SPRAY TAN FANATIC🪓🔪🧨⚠️)

P.S. may HAIRY TOAD forever be in your prayers🙏 MERRY CHRISTMAS TO ALL AND TO ALL A GOOD NIGHT 🛷🌙💤

attributes.title: MY PHONE ALMOST GOT HACKED!!!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!
attributes.review: THIS IS THE WORST APP EVER!! AND YES I AM SCREAMING BECAUSE THIS APP IS SO BAD IT MAKES ME ANGRY!! I TAKES FOREVER TO DOWNLOAD THEN IT MAKES YOUR PHONE GO SUPER SLOW!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT!!!
